metadata.title: CVE-2024-45411 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Twig is a template language for PHP. Under some circumstances, the sandboxsecurity checks are not run which allows user-contributed templates tobypass the sandbox restrictions. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.44.8,2.16.1, and 3.14.0.

criterions.comment: php-twig package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
